body: Don't get me wrong, I probably have no legs to stand on, but I can never understand how people can enjoy it when they literally say they are elementary schoolers. Like least in most loli they try and disguise and hide it but at least imo as soon as they literally say they are middle school or younger it gets just disturbing instead of anything else. But like I said I have no room to talk I am into some fucked up shit as well lol

a little quest from me: find the shota!
idiots >.> can you please tag properly
Finally. I been waiting for this translation for a while.
